definition: line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

sentences.english: The bright young man can get ahead quickly in the tourist industry.
sentences.chinese: 這位聰明的年輕人在旅遊業界很快獲得成功。

sentences.english: Over the past 10-plus years, the booming tourist industry has stimulated the Great wall's renovation project.
sentences.chinese: 十幾年來，蓬勃發展的旅遊業促進了長城的修繕工程。

sentences.english: Heir to an industrial past, the region has turned towards tourism.
sentences.chinese: 曾經工業的繼承者，而如今這裏已轉向旅遊業。

sentences.english: Tourism industry is not the genuine "smokeless industry".
sentences.chinese: 旅遊業並非真正意義上的“無煙工業”。

sentences.english: Secondly, this paper has dissected the current situation about management of tourist's development of Zaozhuang.
sentences.chinese: 其次，剖析棗莊旅遊業發展管理的現狀。

sentences.english: Holiday economics brought a lot of profits to hotels and tourism.
sentences.chinese: 假日經濟給賓館和旅遊業帶來了很大利潤。

sentences.english: Ms. Cockerell said the sector still had room to grow.
sentences.chinese: 但科克雷爾說，中國的旅遊業仍有增長的空間。

sentences.english: Tourism and fishing are being developed on the archipelago.
sentences.chinese: 旅遊業和捕魚業在這個多島國家大大發展。

sentences.english: Tourism and copra production are the leading industries of the island.
sentences.chinese: 島上最主要的產業是旅遊業和珊瑚製品加工業。

sentences.english: The tourism industry believes that low-cost products prone to security risks.
sentences.chinese: 旅遊業者認爲，低價產品容易存在安全風險。

sentences.english: Here are some indications of how unprepared the industry is.
sentences.chinese: 下面的案例說明了世界旅遊業尚未準備好開門迎客。

sentences.english: In the recently 10-plus years, the booming tourism industry in China has prompted the Great wall's renovation project.
sentences.chinese: 十幾年來，蓬勃發展的旅遊業促進了長城的修繕工程。

sentences.english: Developing the forest tourism industry energetically has become the new bright spot of the landscape planning.
sentences.chinese: 大力發展森林旅遊業，成爲景觀規劃的新亮點。

sentences.english: There are many individual tourism resources in Hejin City, but now tourism industry does not start to operate.
sentences.chinese: 河津市旅遊資源獨特而豐富，但是旅遊業並未啓動。

sentences.english: Tourist industry is becoming a pillar industry of Tongren economy.
sentences.chinese: 旅遊業將成爲銅仁經濟發展的支柱產業。

definition: to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
running/operation (of airport, bus service, business etc)
